questions.quote: You shut up!  I demand a recess so I can take him outside and help him regain hius composure.
Hi, I haven't eaten in three days. I was wondering how much longer it would be until I get my X-ray.
Ovaltine. Have you ever had this stuff? Why is it called Ovaltine?
Before we get started, I am happy to tell you that Eddie Sherman is no longer writing for this catalog.
Oh, this is my friend, Jerry Seinfeld. I just bumped into him around the corner. Isn't that a coincidence? The funny thing is, I see him all the time.
